subtitle: Greek yogurt is well known as a baste for meat and chicken, but it is superb with fresh salmon too. In this recipe the yogurt is flavoured with fresh dill, lemon and ground coriander.

method.text: Place the yogurt into a bowl. Stir in garlic, ground coriander, lemon juice and rind, <sup>2</sup>/<sub>3</sub> of the dill, and the salt. Spread over both sides of the salmon fillets.
Preheat a hot grill. Place salmon fillets on a large sheet of foil on the grill pan. Grill for 10-12 min, without turning the salmon, until it flakes easily when tested with the point of a knife.
Serve salmon on a bed of salad leaves with the wedges of fresh fig, if using. Sprinkle with remaining chopped dill and garnish with the sprigs.

title: Athenian salmon with lemon and dill
